alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Baldwin Inland; Covington; Escambia; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 27 at 2:59PM CDT until September 27 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STONE & GEORGE COUNTIES IN MISSISSIPPI, MOBILE, BALDWIN, ESCAMBIA, AND CONECUH COUNTIES IN ALABAMA, AND ALL OF THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH KBDI/ERC VALUES... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT WEDNESDAY FOR THE ENTIRE REGION DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH KBDI/ERC VALUES... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH KBDI/ERC VALUES... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT WEDNESDAY DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS BETWEEN 15 TO 25 MPH, AND HIGH KBDI/ERC VALUES... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 059, 060, 078, 079, 201, 202, 203, 204, 205, 206, 261, 262, 263, 264, 265 and 266. * WINDS...North 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 19 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Baldwin Inland; Covington; Escambia; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland
